Text: This is old version 2.5.0 not to be mistaken for 2.8.5 Thanks .. spkenny2

Just a heads up for those that still want to play, in December 2011 the devs shut down the authentication and account servers for the "old" versions of America's Army. The community has fought back and we have our own authentication and account system setup now with 2.5 Assist. AA25.org or AAO25.com for more info.
